sys_ux_client_script.name: List CRUD

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_a737cfb8472231107b748a5f746d437d
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="List">1b3707b8472231107b748a5f746d43f8</macroponent><name>List CRUD </name><preset/><required_translations>[
    
]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({api, event, imports}) {
  let type = '';
	if(event.name === "NOW_RECORD_LIST_CONNECTED#SAVE_AS_REQUESTED") {
		type = "CREATE";
	}
	else if (event.name  ===  "NOW_RECORD_LIST_CONNECTED#DELETE_REQUESTED") {
		type = "DESTROY";
	}
	else if (event.name  ===  "NOW_RECORD_LIST_CONNECTED#RENAME_REQUESTED" ||  event.name  ===  "NOW_RECORD_LIST_CONNECTED#EDIT_COLUMNS_REQUESTED" || event.name  === "NOW_RECORD_LIST_CONNECTED#SAVE_REQUESTED") {
		type = "UPDATE";
	}

	const CRUD = {
		type: type,
		options: event.payload.update,
		timestamp: event.payload.timestamp
	};
	
	api.setState('CRUD', CRUD);
}]]></script><script_api_version>1.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>kiril.shandaliuk</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-11-14 13:19:27</sys_created_on><sys_id>a737cfb8472231107b748a5f746d437d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>List CRUD </sys_name><sys_package display_value="Finance Request" source="x_1178586_financ_0">2194808c472231107b748a5f746d43fd</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Finance Request">2194808c472231107b748a5f746d43fd</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_a737cfb8472231107b748a5f746d437d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>kiril.shandaliuk</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-11-14 13:19:27</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
